play.comments: Szenario 44. Tribal Assault. Leeroy op, 20er Schellen.
We failed scenario 81, barely getting to the last room in time
Waldemar gick i pension med sin karaktär men har inte valt ny än.

Tredje delen. Klarade det nätt och jämnt. Nisse kolade lite innan, Åke på sista. Tre rum, först massor av oozes och Forest imps, men vi hade tur och oozarna delade sig aldrig. Men mkt poison och curses och target 2. I sista rummet imps och drakar. Åke fick kola lite imps. - Scenario #64 - Underwater lagoon 3(3)
Scenarios 21, 42, 45, 49 Brute, Cragheart, Elementalist, and Diviner LvL9
Charaktere: Tüftler, Barbar, Felsenherz Szenario 76: Schwarmling-Nest

Another first time success. There were orchids we had to save, and we had an escort again, but this time he was actually useful! Everyone we freed an orchid, he gained +1 attack and by the end was a proper beefcake with a base attack of 11!!
Generally fairly plain sailing, but sadly Jen got exhausted just after half way through.
My “kill everything” card was very useful again.
Absolutely stomped the Bandit Commander; He didn’t have a chance. He only got door A open before we killed him. No chest opened though… - 2. Barrow Lair

93 on difficulty 5 (plus 1). Tinkerer and soothesinger stunned and disarmed their way through, doing damage with wounds. Card depletion was only worry. Hardly any attacks came their way. 22 rounds long. Singer hit 9.
Szenario 13: Tempel des Sehers Charaktere: Tüftler, Barbar, Felsenherz
Completed scenario 56, retiring the Diviner and unlocking the Doomstalker! Rolled a new Diviner, but I'm looking to get her retired fast.

73 - Rockslide Ridge
We’re back!!!
After a long hiatus, the adventurers resumed their journey.
The MVP was no doubt Harold the Squid, and the Curse Status effect. The team quickly kept the enemy Curse deck loaded with 7-10 cards and about half way through each Curse card drawn turned into 3 damage for the enemy aggressor.
The sturdy Quartermaster helped the team as he bravely ventured into the final chamber and faced the initial onslaught of 5 enemies. He had some key Bless hits as well. Boy can he jump over rocks.
Eline sat in the back and just tried to buy time for the team, taking cheap shots where possible. Disarm and Stun inflicted the most harm to the enemy side. This rocky terrain was not conducive to her sedentary build.
Did we play it right by not activating the Artillery until the 2nd room or was it supposed to be all 1 big room? Let us know in the comments.
Next 42
